option.name: Open
option.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

option.name: Accepted
option.description: The assignee has understood the item and accepted it to his/her tasklist.

option.name: In Progress
option.description: This issue is being actively worked on at the moment by the assignee.

option.name: Reopened
option.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

option.name: Resolved
option.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

option.name: Closed
option.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
